title: Time For a Showdown: Why Obama Needs to Debate the NRA President on Live TV
text: Mr. President , there is something you can do to get gun legislation: debate NRA chief Wayne LaPierre . Millions would watch, and youâ€™d change many minds. On Thursday, in the wake of yet another school shooting, President Obama went into the
